Reviews.Title: Great but not awesome...
Reviews.Author: sande276
Reviews.Content: I originally bought this phone in early 2010 through tmobile when I was a customer. It was a perfect smartphone for someone who never had one. I still think it could be a great smartphone for a first time smartphone user...however with all the upgrades on apps in the play store it makes this phone run slow. However after two years and lots of wear and tear this phone has barley started having issues like resetting,freezing and not responding. I feel though for the price here on Amazon this phone isnt worth it unless its all you can afford or you just want a super basic smartphone. I have to say save yourself the hassel and upgrade to the HTC mytouch ($209 on Amazon). Especally if you plan to have the phone for a few years and avoid this model if you plan to really work this phone with a bunch of apps.Note: This model runs froyo with no upgrade to gingerbread. So if you have this phone,recently purchased or considering it there is an application in the play store called GO Launcher ex (which gives you the option to hide all the unnessary preloaded apps installed on the phone)...it gives this phone an upgraded look and feel...I actually like it more then ice cream sandwhich. It has a bunch of add-ons that are spectacular. Anways I have noticed since I upgraded to this launcher my phone doesnt restart anymore and doesnt freeze as often....just something to think about I guess.

Reviews.Title: Not 3G over other than TMobile only Edge
Reviews.Author: ComputerGeek
Reviews.Content: Got this phone (now for a few months now). It came unlock as advertised. There is no Querty keyboard as it said in the instructions but has a 3.5mm audio jack in the top. It is unlock and I'm using on a different network than TMobile. It says TMobile at the top and myTouch 3G when starts. The frequencies supported by the phone makes it work ONLY on EDGE as for other carrier different than TMobile (I have never put in a TMobile sim). So if you plan to use this as a 3G phone for other than TMobile search elsewhere. With time I came to realize there are a few different versions of this phone. The one I got (TMobile myTouch 3G) is only EDGE on the carrier that I'm using (every carrier that is not TMobile or support its 3G frecuencies). The 3G is ONLY ON TMobile. Other than the phone being slow on Edge it has been good to me. Signal/Battery is acceptable not great but I can live with that (will depend on usage). Just recently I installed a custom firmware and it is running good (still on Froyo).As of performance, this is an old hardware phone so no angry birds for you. You may download it but there is no way to use it, it is just too slow. I use this phone as my everyday phone as well as for development.About the package/shipping:All Perfect! IN time, Perfectly clean and No physical problems whatsoever. Just plugged in the battery + my Sim card and work from day one. It came with android 1.6 or 2.1 but the same day I opened it and in minutes auto downloaded the update to Froyo flawless.So overall if you do not want a high end phone and are ok to use ALWAYS EDGE it is recommended. If you want to use 3G on other network than TMobile or want a high end phone look elsewhere.I gave 3 Stars for the EDGE and is may be my bad just to research on the web beforehand. Got confuse with the TMobile 3G thing.

Reviews.Title: I am very disappointed with my phone
Reviews.Author: Cordel O.
Reviews.Content: I don't like it because it cannot be up grade. I cannot get whatsApp etc. It did not meet my expectation

Reviews.Title: Amazing Phone!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sav-Way Cellular Wholesale
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent phone for someone who has a gsm service provider and travels to other countries. Its compatible with any network and its an android so you can get all your favorite apps. I strongly recommend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: not what i was looking for
Reviews.Author: kayk
Reviews.Content: i was looking forward to have a phone that i will be able download watsapp then to my knowledge the htc magic a6161 android G2 was a G1.5 and not G2 what they advertise

Reviews.Title: Nice cell phone.
Reviews.Author: A.B.C.
Reviews.Content: I love my HTC magic, it's indeed unlocked cell phone. It looks fancy and pretty, to tell the truth, the phone is a bit slow and I have troubles using USB and bluetooth, I hope I'll fix them ,but in overall it's a good purchase comparing to the price.

Reviews.Title: Muy bonito
Reviews.Author: zenicami
Reviews.Content: Bonito producto muy buena presentación buen acabado lo recomiendo muy buen telefono el color excelente rápido para mensaje exente cámara fácil. Funcionalidad

Reviews.Title: It's exactly what i wanted all the features work!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dernelle Mc Williams
Reviews.Content: It's the G1 and it'c great. The features are out of this world It's my PC away from my PC,lol!

Reviews.Title: Bueno.. y razonable.
Reviews.Author: Adan
Reviews.Content: Tanto en peso y en diseno es muy bueno. sin dudas todo lo que uno puede realizar con Android a parte de su cantidad de aplicaciones este telefono es excelente.Lo que cambiaria es la bateria que dura muy poco, aunque el supongo que es razonable.Recomiendo comprar un telefono con mayor duracion de bateria.

Reviews.Title: poor
Reviews.Author: S. Shah
Reviews.Content: do not buy this phone. battery sucks. the sad part of me is i only came to know after 32 days.without using the phone i am charging the phone every day.Worst phone i have seen.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked? I couldn't get it to work
Reviews.Author: M. Tse "mao"
Reviews.Content: I bought this HTC Magic for use while traveling outside the US, but I couldn't get it to work.  My first suspicion came when I opened the box and found that it was a T-Mobile branded phone.  Well, it was advertised as unlocked, so what could go wrong?When I turned on the phone it took me to an Android screen and asked me to click on the Green Monster to begin.  When I click it tried to connect to some "server", hangs for a few minutes, and fails.  I tried different SIM cards for different networks, same result.  I tried a SIM that has internet connectivity, failed again.To make matters worse this phone does not appear to have wi-fi, so there is no other way to connect to Google's server's except through the phone network, which I can only assume is still tied to T-Mobile.  There are many newer phones that offer both wifi and Bluetooth for less money.I returned the phone without ever getting past the welcome screen.  One star for wasting my time and effort.

Reviews.Title: good enough
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: not bad for my first smartphone...  rooted it as soon as I got it and installed cyanogenmod 6.0 and it runs pretty well.  kinda laggy at times, but with a 32GB sd card, this thing is a monster!

Reviews.Title: It's so slow!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Bobby
Reviews.Content: So, I bought this phone a few months ago and it looked good on the outside. Had a very good design and features. One thing that bothers me very, very, very, very, very, very very much is the suckish speed of the phone. About a 550 hertz processor doesn't sound so bad and it isn't. But that speed is a lie!!! If I were to give an estimate about how fast the phone was, I would have to say 1 hertz processor. No kidding. For example, I go onto an app and when I just press an icon, it says:  Sorry  The acore. processor is not  working right now.That doesn't just happen once. it happens several times and it's very annoying. Just saying.

Reviews.Title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot?
Reviews.Author: Cross
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone through Amazon, seller Unlocked Cell Phone Kings.The phone's probably great, however I was sent a version that was preloaded with a bunch of arabic/muslim apps that were factory set and therefore COULD NOT be unloaded. The default letters were arabic, there were various greetings, the iQuran popped up on my home page, and worst of all, I would get the muslim call to prayer suddenly wailing at me - I nearly drove off the road the first time that happened!So - you kind of have to disclose that the phone has these ...uh, features, so people can make an informed choice...If it came pre-loaded with Christian documents, or iDeclaration of Independence, I'm sure someone would have been taken to court....Anyhow, be warned. I am returning mine and I guess I'll have to try someone else so I know what I'm getting...

Reviews.Title: Excelente celular....
Reviews.Author: Grace
Reviews.Content: Muy bonito, ligero, y fácil de usar. Pero no incluye la tarjeta microSD y creo de deberían de poner un manual de instrucciones y recomendaciones.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work on ATT data plan
Reviews.Author: V. Venkat "VV-007"
Reviews.Content: Nice little phone..Very lightweight and easy to carry around..But due to TMOBILE firmware on the phone the customizattion is very tricky..Doesn't let you go past the Google login screen unless you enter you have a GMAIL account( Bummer) .very annoying way to setup on ATT dataplan..After multiple tries and visiting many forums could not set it up on ATT.May be it will work on TMOBILE..But returning it for now...May be buy the HTC 4G without the carrier firmware in future

Reviews.Title: t-mobile  mytouch 3g no't htc magic.
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: it is a unlocked t-mobile mytouch 3g 3.55mm jack 288m  g2different  htc magic.only use t-mobile's android rom

Reviews.Author: efeyildirim
Reviews.Content: I got the chance to use the product but not yet. Once you've had problems with gmail I tried to open. After you start using again notify views

ProductInfo.Features:
Android OS, Qualcomm MSM7200A 528 MHz Processor, 3.2 Megapixel Camera, 3.2-inch TFT-LCD flat touch-sensitive screen display, A2DP, Bluetooth, Internal GPS Antenna, Calendar, Camera, Candy Bar Form, Edge
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-Band Unlocked GSM cell phone compatible with 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 and 3G 900 / 2100 frequencies plus GPRS / EDGE capabilities
Trackball with Enter button, G-Sensor, Digital Copmpass, High-Speed Data GPRS, Memory Card Slot, MP3, Qwerty Keyboard, Slide Form
450 Minutes of Talk Time, 420 Hours of Standby
Android OS, Qualcomm MSM7200A 528 MHz Processor, 3.2 Megapixel Camera, 3.2-inch TFT-LCD flat touch-sensitive screen, A2DP, Bluetooth, Internal GPS Antenna, Calendar, Camera, Candy Bar Form, Edge
ProductInfo.Name: HTC Magic A6161 Android G2 Unlocked Phone with Quad-Band GSM, 3.2 MP Camera, MP3/Video Player, and MicroSD Slot--International Version with Warranty (Black)
